{"id":957053353,"lang":"cpp","lang_name":"C++","time":"3 months, 4 weeks","timestamp":1685016160,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"166 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/957053353/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Maximum OR","memory":"85.7 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    long long maximumOr(vector<int>& nums, int k) {\n        int n = nums.size();\n        long long prefix[n + 1], suffix[n + 1];\n        long long result, power = 1;\n\n        // Calculate the power of 2\n        for (int i = 0; i < k; i++) {\n            power *= 2;\n        }\n\n        prefix[0] = 0;\n        // Calculate prefix OR values\n        for (int i = 0; i < n; i++) {\n            prefix[i + 1] = prefix[i] | nums[i];\n        }\n\n        suffix[n] = 0;\n        // Calculate suffix OR values\n        for (int i = n - 1; i >= 0; i--) {\n            suffix[i] = suffix[i + 1] | nums[i];\n        }\n\n        result = 0;\n        // Find the maximum OR value\n        for (int i = 0; i < n; i++) {\n            result = max(result, prefix[i] | (nums[i] * power) | suffix[i + 1]);\n        }\n\n        return result;\n    }\n};\n","compare_result":"","title_slug":"maximum-or","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
